text: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَىٰٓ أَحَدٍ مِّنْهُم مَّاتَ أَبَدًا وَلَا تَقُمْ عَلَىٰ قَبْرِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ فَـٰسِقُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And do not pray [the funeral prayer, O Muhammad], over any of them who has died - ever - or stand at his grave. Indeed, they disbelieved in Allah and His Messenger and died while they were defiantly disobedient.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan janganlah kamu sekali-kali menyembahyangkan (jenazah) seorang yang mati di antara mereka, dan janganlah kamu berdiri (mendoakan) di kuburnya. Sesungguhnya mereka telah kafir kepada Allah dan Rasul-Nya dan mereka mati dalam keadaan fasik.
